sources.description: Title: Abr-O Aftaab (1998) Directed by: Mahmoud Kalari Date of birth: 31 April 1951, Tehran, Iran Writing credits: Mahmoud Kalari Music: Hossein Alizadeh Year: 1998 Country: Iran Language: Farsi Color: Color Runtime: 90 min.
